title: Leverage Trading on Aptin
description: Learn about Aptin, a decentralized perpetual exchange on Aptos that allows users to trade with leverage using a wide variety of crypto assets as collateral.

tasks.title: Prepare for Leverage Trading
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Aptin's leverage trading platform

tasks.title: Perpetual Exchange Basics
tasks.description: Understand what a perpetual exchange is
tasks.question: What is a perpetual exchange like Aptin?
options: A platform for spot trading only
A platform for trading perpetual futures contracts with leverage
A platform for lending cryptocurrencies
A platform for trading traditional options
tasks.correctAnswer: A platform for trading perpetual futures contracts with leverage

tasks.title: Leverage Trading
tasks.question: What does trading with leverage on Aptin allow you to do?
options: Remove all risk from trading
Open positions larger than your collateral by borrowing funds
Store tokens for long periods without fees
Automatically stake your tokens for yield
tasks.correctAnswer: Open positions larger than your collateral by borrowing funds

tasks.title: Funding Rate
tasks.question: What is the funding rate in perpetual futures trading?
options: The rate at which new tokens are created
The interest rate paid to lenders
A periodic payment between long and short traders to keep perpetual prices aligned with spot prices
The fee charged for opening a position
tasks.correctAnswer: A periodic payment between long and short traders to keep perpetual prices aligned with spot prices

tasks.title: Collateral Management
tasks.description: Learn how collateral works on Aptin
tasks.question: How does Aptin handle collateral for leveraged positions?
options: Collateral is not required
Users can only use APT as collateral
Various cryptocurrencies can be used as collateral
Physical assets are required as collateral
tasks.correctAnswer: Various cryptocurrencies can be used as collateral

tasks.title: Liquidation Mechanism
tasks.question: What happens during a liquidation on Aptin?
options: Your account is permanently blocked
Your position is forcibly closed when your maintenance margin falls below a threshold
You receive a warning and 24 hours to add more collateral
Liquidations never occur on Aptin
tasks.correctAnswer: Your position is forcibly closed when your maintenance margin falls below a threshold

tasks.title: Price Oracle Integration
tasks.description: Learn how Aptin determines asset prices
tasks.question: How does Aptin determine prices for its trading pairs?
options: Manual price updates by the team
Through integrated oracles like Pyth Network
Based solely on internal trading activity
Using centralized exchange APIs directly
tasks.correctAnswer: Through integrated oracles like Pyth Network

tasks.title: Risk Management
tasks.question: What is a primary risk of leverage trading on platforms like Aptin?
options: No risks exist in leverage trading
Only the risk of platform hacks
Amplified losses due to leverage and potential liquidations
Risk of tokens being stolen by other users
tasks.correctAnswer: Amplified losses due to leverage and potential liquidations

tasks.title: Order Types
tasks.description: Learn about different order types on Aptin
tasks.question: Which of these order types might be available on Aptin?
options: Only market orders
Only limit orders
Market, limit, stop-loss, and take-profit orders
Only conditional orders
tasks.correctAnswer: Market, limit, stop-loss, and take-profit orders

tasks.title: Implementation Technology
tasks.description: Understand how Aptin is built on Aptos
tasks.question: How is Aptin implemented on the Aptos blockchain?
options: As an off-chain service with centralized settlement
Using Solidity smart contracts
Using Move modules for on-chain execution and settlement
Through a hybrid system with transactions processed off-chain
tasks.correctAnswer: Using Move modules for on-chain execution and settlement
